name: Code Breaker PS2 Save File
summary: Learn about .CBS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CBS files can be converted to the .PSU and .MAX formats using the program mymc.

description: Saved game state file created by Code Breaker, a PlayStation 2 (PS2) accessory program used to create game cheats and transfer saved games to a PC; contains saved state information for a specific game; used to load a preconfigured state in a PS2 games.
